snippet: Video of motorcyclists pulling a man out of his car in Upper Manhattan and beating him left some clients of security companies calling and asking if there was a plan for such a thing.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column addresses issue of driver safety when confronted by situation like that facing driver of SUV who found himself surrounded by motorcyclists on Henry Hudson Parkway; retired law enforcement officers acknowledge there is no standard response.
lead_paragraph: Video of motorcyclists pulling a man out of his car in Upper Manhattan and beating him left some clients of security companies calling and asking if there was a plan for such a thing.

headline.main: Practicing Self-Defense When Motorcyclists Make a Drive Dangerous
headline.print_headline: Practicing Self-Defense When a Drive Turns Dangerous
